S:log-item.D:comment:
Webarchive packageing prepared for including IoC metadata descriptors - including configured IoC descriptors in war distribution - improved dependency fetching (on demand) - fixed some spelling errors
Hessian Webservice support - created hessian servlet as a generic http interface for provided services - Interface def., Impl. and Tests - services can be exposed via HessianSkeletonProvider by defining a mapping key, Interface and an implementation instance.
